item.title: ceph commands
item.description: ceph status [root@ceph0 ~]# ceph -s cluster: id: 0ad3892c-c903-44d3-8872-b7536d10bcdb health: HEALTH_OK services: mon: 1 daemons, quorum ceph0 mgr: ceph0(active) osd: 3 osds: 3 up, 3 in data: pools: 5 pools, 258 pgs objects: 0 objects, 0B usage: 3.01GiB used, 897GiB / 900GiB avail pgs: 258 active+clean # watch cluster health [root@ceph0 ~]# ceph -w cluster: id: 0ad3892c-c903-44d3-8872-b7536d10bcdb health: HEALTH_OK services: mon: 1 daemons, quorum ceph0 mgr: ceph0(active) osd: 3 osds: 3 up, 3 in data: pools: 5 pools, 258 pgs objects: 0 objects, 0B usage: 3.
